generatedTitle: what size is a movie poster

extractFactDictList.question: What is the standard size for a movie poster?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The standard size for a movie poster, also known as a one-sheet, is 27 inches by 40 inches (approximately 68.58 cm by 101.6 cm).
